revision.text:
In '''Shops''', various currencies can be exchanged for useful items such as [[Evolution Items]], [[Eggs]], and [[Pokéballs]].

The prices shown in the tables below reflect the base prices of each item. When bought in bulk, items increase in price by various amounts. With the exception of [[File:Masterball.png|25px]][[Masterball|Masterballs]] and [[File:Protein_Item.png|25px]][[Protein]], the price of shop items can be decreased back to their base price by defeating Pokémon on routes, [[Gyms]], and [[Dungeons]]. [[Key Items]], [[Oak Item|Oak Items]], and [[Farm Hand|Farm Hands]] are bolded and can only be bought once. ==[[Kanto]]: Locations & Items== ===Main Region + Sevii Islands 123=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! 90,000 {{questpoints}} || - || - || - || - || - || - || - |- |} ==Poké Mart== A Department Store can be found in every region and are located in: *[[Towns & Cities#Kanto|Celadon City]] - Does not stock [[File:Ultraball.png|25px]][[Ultraball|Ultraballs]], [[File:SmallRestore.png|25px]][[Small Restore|Small Restores]], [[File:MediumRestore.png|25px]][[Medium Restore|Medium Restores]], or [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]] *[[Towns & Cities#Johto|Goldenrod City]] - Does not stock [[File:LargeRestore.png|25px]][[Large Restore|Large Restores]] *[[Towns & Cities#Hoenn|LilyCove City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Sinnoh|Veilstone City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Unova|Shopping Mall Nine]] *[[Towns & Cities#Kalos|Lumiose City]] *[[Towns & Cities#Alola|Royal Avenue]]
